passages.text:
You wake up on the floor of a damp cave. As you stand up and brush the dirt off your clothes, you look behind you to see a pile of rocks blocking the rest of the room. 

It appears you have fallen victim to a collapse.

Glancing around the room you being to formulate a plan to escape.
The room is narrow with holes all throughout the walls, some of the holes are oozing a green fluid. There is a single exit ahead of you.

[[Take the path ahead->Reservoir]]
[[Inspect the Ooz->Ooz]]
[[Inspect the rocks behind you->Collapsed Exit]]
passages.name: Game Start

passages.text:
Following the path ahead, 
the cave opens up into a small room with a pool of green ooz in the middle. There are many more holes in the walls of the room than the last and many of them are wider as well.

There are flies buzzing all throughout the room, entering and exiting the various holes.


There is a hole at the top of the room that you think you might just be able to squeeze into.

[[Proceed into the hole in the top of the room->Fork in the path]]
[[Inspect the various holes->Holes]]
[[Inspect the pool of green ooz->Ooz Pool]]
[[Go back->Game Start]]

links.name: Proceed into the hole in the top of the room
Inspect the pool of green ooz

passages.name: Reservoir

passages.text:
Looking closer at the green ooz filling some of the holes, you see a small collection of insects trapped inside. From the empty holes you hear a faint buzzing noise.

[[Stop Inspecting the Ooz->Game Start]]
passages.name: Ooz

passages.text:
You look back at the collapsed pathway. 
On closer inspection you notice that the holes in the wall extend to the damaged part of the wall as well.
As you begin to turn away you notice that there is something underneath the collection of rocks.

Red ooz is pooling from whatever is underneath the rocks.

[[Don't push your luck->Game Start]]
[[Start digging into the rocks->Rocks]]
passages.name: Collapsed Exit

passages.text:
You start digging at the rocks in the pile. 

After enough digging, you accidentally grab one of rocks that had been sitting in the ooz. You feel a searing pain as you drop the rock and immediately go to wipe the red ooz off your hand.

You decide It best to leave the pile as it lay
[[Return to the investigation at hand->Game Start]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand

passages.name: Rocks

passages.text:
As you climb up out of the room you immediately feel a difference. It's dark...and cold. 
As you continue through the passage you come across a bend in the path.

You decide that this is a good enough place as ever to take a rest.
...
After a time of rest you continue along with your exploration.

Peering down the path, you see the faint outline of red eggs. You can hear a faint scuttling in the distance.

[Feeling the stick you have been holding heat up, you glace to the side to see that a new path has opened up.
Something about this new path compels you.
There is a bright red light down the path]

[[Continue down the bend->Spider's lair]]
[[Go back->Reservoir]] 

[[Continue down into the red light->Heaven]]

links.name: Continue down into the red light

passages.name: Fork in the path

passages.text:
You decide to get a closer look at the holes.

There are a number of insects flying in and out of the the holes. As you get closer to the insects, you feel a faint warmth.

[[Return to the investigation at hand->Reservoir]] 
[[Stick your hand in one of the holes->You idiot]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand
Stick your hand in one of the holes

passages.name: Holes

passages.text:
You peer into the green ooz pool.
You see some kind of metallic stick laying at the bottom.

[[Return to the investigation at hand->Reservoir]] 

[[Reach into the pool and grab the object->Get Stick]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand
Reach into the pool and grab the object

passages.name: Ooz Pool

passages.text:
You stick your hand into one of the holes and immidiately feel a comforting warmth...

followed by several painfull stings. You retract your sore arm.

[[Return to the investigation at hand->Reservoir]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand

passages.name: You idiot

passages.text:
Reaching into the pool, you feel a warmth envelop your arm as you grab the stick and retract your arm.
While holding the stick you notice that it is significantly warmer than the pool around it.

As you wipe the ooz off your arm, you find yourself amazed to see the pool of green ooz turn to red as the stick you now hold begins to cool. 

Inspecting the stick, you come to the conclusion that it must be important and decide to take it with you.

[[Return to the investigation at hand->Reservoir]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand

passages.name: Get Stick

passages.text:
As you continue into the cave, 
you find yourself rather large room, the room is lit by the faint glow of red eggs.

The room continues deeper into the cave and you can make out a door off to the side.

You can see something moving in the distance

[[Inspect the eggs->Eggs]]
[[Check the door->Door]]
[[Continue deeper into the cave->Nest]]
[[Go back->Fork in the path]]
passages.name: Spider's lair

passages.text:
Heading into the second passage,
You are briefly blinded by an intense red light before seeing a vastly different landscape in front of you.

Before you is a vast strech of impossible stairways to nowhere and eternal mechinisms ticking away. Above everything is a bright red orb at the top of an impossible tower. The orb shines a red light over everything.

Dotting the impossible landscape is a handful of mechanical beings patrolling the land. You've only ever heard storys of the lucky few who managed to escape them during the ascension...Angels they used to call them...Not the kind of thing for an acursed like you to bump into.

It appeares in trying to avoid a danger, you have dived straight into a bigger one.

You glance back at the way you came only to see a wall directly behind you. Steeling yourself, you decide to march forward and find another exit. 

If you found a way in, there must be a way out afterall...

You feel the stick you picked up warm up every time you look at the orb atop everything.

The tower is made up of a collection of staircases crisscrossing together. At the center is a platform with some kind of device on the edge.

[[Attempt to climb the impossible stairs->Stairs]]
[[Try to use the platform->Elevator]]

links.name: Attempt to climb the impossible stairs

passages.name: Heaven

passages.text:
Taking a closer look at the eggs,
you see that they are made of some kind of translucent material with a red ooz within. You can see pieces of torn away metal glowing at the bottom of each egg. 

[[Return to the investigation at hand->Spider's lair]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand

passages.name: Eggs

passages.text:
You take a closer look at the door,
The metal all around the door is torn apart and yet it stands sturdy.

The door is locked

There is something scratched into the surface of the door.

"Lord help whoever may find themselves on the other side of this door. The creatures care not to read so know this:
They care for one thing and one thing alone, 
their captured vitims...They quite literally cannot see anything else. I've hid the key somewhere they would never touch. God speed."

[[Return to the investigation at hand->Spider's lair]] 

[[Unlock the Door->Home]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand

passages.name: Door

passages.text:
You continue to explore deeper into the cave,

you have traveled into some kind of nursery, there are hundreds of small eggs all around you. Some of the eggs have a green ooz piled on the top. 

It is eerily quiet.

[[Inspect the eggs->Eggs Again]]
[[Explore even deeper->Square One]]
[[Return to the entrance of the nest->Spider's lair]]

links.name: Return to the entrance of the nest

passages.name: Nest

passages.text:
You begin to check all of the eggs in the room,

You spend hours searching through the eggs until eventually you find one thats different from the others.

The egg is cracked open and lying on its side. Taking a closer look at it, you see the glowing shape of a key submerged in the red ooz.

[[Retrieve the key->Last Hurdle]]
passages.name: Eggs Again

passages.text:
You continue deeper into the cave,
after a long while of navigating corridor after corridor of next you finally reach the end only to find the other side of the cave in you woke up at.

Underneath the rocks is the crushed body of a massive spider like creature.

The creature itself looks ancient, giant corroded metal sheets are affixed to its back and its hide has collected enough crud to give it a second exoskeleton. There are scratch marks adorning the walls of the cave from its struggling to escape. 

The creatures corpse lays there in front of you in a pool of its own red ooz.

[[Return to the investigation at hand->Nest]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand

passages.name: Square One

passages.text:
You decide to take the risk and plunge your hand into the egg, 

You immidiately regret your decision. You feel searing pain as you lower your hand through the ooz. 
(set: $Key to true)
the moment you feel the key you retract your hand and wipe away the ooz. 
(set: $Damage to it + 1)
(if:$Damage is 1)[You have injured yourself]
(if:$Damage is 2)[You are severely injured]
(if:$Damage is 3)[You are gravely injured]
(if:$Damage > 3)[You cannot continue like this]
[[Return to the investigation at hand->Nest]]

links.name: Return to the investigation at hand

passages.name: Last Hurdle

passages.text:
Passing through the door,

You find yourself inside some kind of a shelter. It seems that a long time ago people lived here, there are ancient half eaten rations everywhere and there are still scorch marks from the ascension.

After a short time of exploring the shelter, you eventually find a hatch that leads to the surface.

You embrace the warm sun as you bask in your surroundings. Collapsed skyscrapers and rusted cars surround you. After you've had enough you begin to navigate your way out of the city. 

While navigating through the destroyed buildings and overgrown vines dotting the city, you finally run into your tribe. The few members remaining welcome you with open arms.

As you exit the city on your way back to the small village set up a few miles south, you glance back and wonder what other secrets those caves might have held...

THE END
passages.name: Home

passages.text:
You begin to travel along the flight of stairs. You find yourself traversing these steps far longer than you had ever anticipated, not only that but the top of the tower is nowhere in sight!

Hours of traveling the stairs later and you feel the exaustion setting in, you briefly consider taking a break.

[[Keep going->Stairs]] 
[[Stop and rest->Sleep]]
passages.name: Stairs

passages.text:
Inspecting the platform leads you to believe that you've come across some kind of elevator. 

There is some kind of mechanism attached to it with a thin hole in the middle. It seems to be some kind of lever.

[[Return->Heaven]] 
[[Try manually moving the lever->Lever]]
[[Try putting your stick in it->Stick]]

links.name: Try putting your stick in it

passages.name: Elevator

passages.text:
The Lever seems to be stuck, you could try applying more force to move it.

[[Don't risk it->Elevator]] 
[[Force it->Elevator Time]]
passages.name: Lever

passages.text:
You try plunging your stick into the hole, it seems to be slightly too big but if you apply more force it might fit.

[[Don't take the risk->Elevator]] 
[[Try it->Lose Stick]]
passages.name: Stick

passages.text:
You force the stick into the slot and feel the elevator whiring to life. 

It smoothly carries you to the top as you step off the mechanism and find yourself at the very top of the tower and at the base of the orb.

There is a hatch on the bottom of the orb.

[[Enter the hatch->Orb]]
[[Try climbing down the stairs->Stairs]]
passages.name: Lose Stick

passages.text:
You force the level forward as the entire platform begins to screech and rumble while slowly lifting you up the path. 

You watch the landscape as the platform continues to rattle and shake. 
You almost start to feel at ease before you feel the hairs on your neck stand up.

you slowely turn around to meet an angel that climbed onto the platform. The machine has no eyes but it still feels like its staring holes in your body. Hundreds of years of fear and panic shoot through your body as you gaze upon your natural predator. 

The angel lets out a siren that pierces your ears.

[[Attack it->Destroy]]
[[Jump off the elevator->Stairs Jump]]
passages.name: Elevator Time

passages.text:
Entering the orb you find yourself in a small room with a computer at the center. On the screen is two words, 
"INSERT KEY"
There is a pedistol with a thin hole inside.

[[Leave the orb and try to take the stairs down->Stairs]] 
[[Insert the stick into the hole->Escape]]

links.name: Leave the orb and try to take the stairs down
Insert the stick into the hole

passages.name: Orb

passages.text:
One of the angel's mechanical limbs reaches out to grab you, but you're quicker. 
You stab your stick into it's mechanical innards, jamming the thousands of clockwork gears within. 

You're people have spent far too long fearing these being's return. 

The angel locks up for a moment before falling off the edge and landing with a satisfying thud. You were just fast enough to retrieve the stick too.

After a few moments the elevator finally reaches the top of the tower, leaving you at the base of the orb. There is a hatch on the bottom.

[[Enter the hatch->Orb]]
passages.name: Destroy

passages.text:
You leap off the elevator and land on one of the many flights of stairs. Amazingly you find that the angel has left you alone and returns to an inactive state under the platform.

[[Start climbing->Stairs]]
passages.name: Stairs Jump

passages.text:
You decide to stop and get some rest on the stairs. Before long you begin to nod off.

Little would you know that in your sleep would you take your last breath on those impossible stairs.

THE END
passages.name: Sleep

passages.text:
A hatch opens up on the top of the orb and you quickly climb out of the orb

You feel immense relief as you breath in the fresh air and bask in the your own sun. you look outward to see your home village far in the distance. Just to the north you can see the massive ruins of the city you were traversing before all of this started. 

Looking down you see that you are on the top of a tower. This one, however, is not made of stairs but instead of several blocks that slowely narrow as it reaches the bottom. 

You slowely and carefully climb down the tower and walk north to your home. you feel an immense sense of pride in yourself as you return home the first acursed to have bested an angel.

You do wonder, however, what else you would have found if you had continued to stay in the cave...

THE END
passages.name: Escape
